name: sync::lazy_lock::LazyLock::<T, F>::into_inner

sync::once::Once::state.doc:
Returns the current state of the `Once` instance.

 Since this takes a mutable reference, no initialization can currently
 be running, so the state must be either "incomplete", "poisoned" or
 "complete".

core::panicking::panic.doc: The underlying implementation of core's `panic!` macro when no formatting is used.

core::mem::ManuallyDrop::<T>::into_inner.doc:
Extracts the value from the `ManuallyDrop` container.

 This allows the value to be dropped again.

 # Examples

 ```rust
 use std::mem::ManuallyDrop;
 let x = ManuallyDrop::new(Box::new(()));
 let _: Box<()> = ManuallyDrop::into_inner(x); // This drops the `Box`.
 ```
